None.Name: Painful Shot
None.Description: Every 2 seconds, tower fires a painful shot that deals 85 damage to enemies in a 5m radius around its target, up to 130 in total. Every shot reduces the tower's life points by 50. Tower will no longer attack once its life points have been reduced too far. Knocks back small units.

None.Name: Sacrifice
None.Description: Activate to sacrifice an own unit in order to transfer the victim's lifepoints into own lifepoints. Reusable every 15 seconds.
